targets.query: SELECT max("value") AS "Max_Bandwidth" FROM "Interface-check-command" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "service" =~ /^IfCheck-[[service]]$/ AND "state" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "metric", "service"

SELECT max("value") AS "Max_Bandwidth" FROM "Interface-check-command" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "service" =~ /^IfCheck-[[service]]$/ AND "state" = 'OK') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "metric", "service"

SELECT mean("value") FROM "Interface-check-command" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'in_bits' AND "service" =~ /^IfCheck-[[interface]]$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

list.definition: SELECT hosts.display_name FROM $datasource WHERE vars.device_type = $device_type AND groups ~ (${hostgroup:pipe})
list.label: Hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: SELECT hosts.display_name FROM $datasource WHERE vars.device_type = $device_type AND groups ~ (${hostgroup:pipe})

list.definition: select rp from forever.rp_config where  ($__to - $__from > "start") and ($__to - $__from <= "end")
list.name: rp
list.query: select rp from forever.rp_config where  ($__to - $__from > "start") and ($__to - $__from <= "end")
